trans-unit.source: Performs a read/write operation on a named pipe

seg-source.mrk: Performs a read/write operation on a named pipe

target.mrk: Performs a read/write operation on a named pipe

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Pipe name

seg-source.mrk: Pipe name

target.mrk: Pipe name

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the buffer containing the data written to the pipe

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to the buffer containing the data written to the pipe

target.mrk: Pointer to the buffer containing the data written to the pipe

trans-unit.source: Size of the write buffer, in bytes

seg-source.mrk: Size of the write buffer, in bytes

target.mrk: Size of the write buffer, in bytes

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the buffer that receives the data read from the pipe

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to the buffer that receives the data read from the pipe

target.mrk: Pointer to the buffer that receives the data read from the pipe

trans-unit.source: Size of the read buffer, in bytes

seg-source.mrk: Size of the read buffer, in bytes

target.mrk: Size of the read buffer, in bytes

trans-unit.source: On return, contains the number of bytes read from the pipe

seg-source.mrk: On return, contains the number of bytes read from the pipe

target.mrk: On return, contains the number of bytes read from the pipe

trans-unit.source: [optional] Number of milliseconds to wait for the named pipe to be available.

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
Number of milliseconds to wait for the named pipe to be available.

target.mrk: [optional]
Number of milliseconds to wait for the named pipe to be available.

trans-unit.source: In addition to numeric values, the following special values can be specified:

seg-source.mrk: In addition to numeric values, the following special values can be specified:

target.mrk: In addition to numeric values, the following special values can be specified:

trans-unit.source: -1 - Wait indefinitely

seg-source.mrk: -1 - Wait indefinitely

target.mrk: -1 - Wait indefinitely

trans-unit.source: 0 - Uses the default time-out specified in the call to the CreateNamedPipe

seg-source.mrk: 0 - Uses the default time-out specified in the call to the CreateNamedPipe

target.mrk: 0 - Uses the default time-out specified in the call to the CreateNamedPipe

trans-unit.source: 1 - Do not wait. If the pipe is not available, return an error

seg-source.mrk: 1 - Do not wait.
If the pipe is not available, return an error

target.mrk: 1 - Do not wait.
If the pipe is not available, return an error

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: True.

seg-source.mrk: True.

target.mrk: True.

trans-unit.source: False.

seg-source.mrk: False.

target.mrk: False.

trans-unit.source: Remarks

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: Calling CallNamedPipe is equivalent to calling the CreateFile (or WaitNamedPipe, if CreateFile cannot open the pipe immediately), TransactNamedPipe, and CloseHandle functions.

seg-source.mrk: Calling CallNamedPipe is equivalent to calling the CreateFile (or WaitNamedPipe, if CreateFile cannot open the pipe immediately), TransactNamedPipe, and CloseHandle functions.

target.mrk: Calling CallNamedPipe is equivalent to calling the CreateFile (or WaitNamedPipe, if CreateFile cannot open the pipe immediately), TransactNamedPipe, and CloseHandle functions.

trans-unit.source: CreateFile is called with an access flag of GENERIC_READ | GENERIC_WRITE, and an inherit handle flag of False.

seg-source.mrk: CreateFile is called with an access flag of GENERIC_READ | GENERIC_WRITE, and an inherit handle flag of False.

target.mrk: CreateFile is called with an access flag of GENERIC_READ | GENERIC_WRITE, and an inherit handle flag of False.

trans-unit.source: CallNamedPipe fails if the pipe is a byte-type pipe.

seg-source.mrk: CallNamedPipe fails if the pipe is a byte-type pipe.

target.mrk: CallNamedPipe fails if the pipe is a byte-type pipe.
